title: How to Use 7Zip to Create Self Extracting excutables

steps.headline: Find the Files, which can be anything, and then click the big green "Add" button.
Make the archive format a .7z (under archive format of course) and look for the create SFX archive which should work after making the archive format .7z
Set any other settings you might need
Click OK and you will be finished

text: Open 7Zip File manager (7zFM.exe)  Find the Files, which can be anything, and then click the big green "Add" button.  Make the archive format a .7z (under archive format of course) and look for the create SFX archive which should work after making the archive format .7z  Set any other settings you might need  Click OK and you will be finished
sentences: Open 7Zip File manager (7zFM.exe)  Find the Files, which can be anything, and then click the big green "Add" button.

Make the archive format a .7z (under archive format of course) and look for the create SFX archive which should work after making the archive format .7z  Set any other settings you might need  Click OK and you will be finished
